name: ApexSqlDotBuild

inputs.name: specIsOutputIncluded
inputs.label: Include output in package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Store output in NuGet package file

inputs.name: specOutputName
inputs.label: ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify output package file name. Use format {name}.{major}.{minor}.{build}

inputs.name: connSource
inputs.label: Database folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether database source project is located in repository root or subfolder path

inputs.name: connSourceSubDir
inputs.label: Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter full path to database source project

inputs.name: scriptStaticData
inputs.label: Include Static Data
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include static data from selected repository

inputs.name: connServer
inputs.label: SQL Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target database server. E.g. SERVERNAME\INSTANCENAME. For local default instance leave as '(local)'

inputs.name: connSqlAuthLogin
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify login name to use for SQL Server authentication. Leave empty for Windows authentication

inputs.name: connSqlAuthPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify password to use for SQL Server authentication. Leave empty for Windows authentication

inputs.name: specProject
inputs.label: ApexSQL Build project file path.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter full path to ApexSQL Build project file. Project file name and extension should be included in path

inputs.name: additionalParams
inputs.label: Additional parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional parameters for ApexSQL Build CLI
